name: VividVale
declaringWar: Don't worry, if we win this war, I'll make sure to preserve your culture...
attacked: Your allies won't look at you the same anymore...
defeated: Future generations may not sing the same songs; or even speak the same language... But as long as people remember what was, VividVale is still alive.
denounced: Not all leaders are perfect... So I'll learn from your criticism.
introduction: I am BennyCUBE! And I welcome you to VividVale country. So... What is your culture like..?
declaringFriendship: I have set up a party at a beach for us, west of Vividstrone- ...For when you sign this treaty of Friendship, of course...
uniques: [+1 Production, +1 Culture] in cities on [Coastal] tiles

name: Eden's Gate
declaringWar: Let them burn. This is God’s will. This is their punishment.
attacked: There they are... the Locusts in our garden... You see they’ve come for me. They’ve come to take me away from you. They’ve come to destroy all that we’ve built!
defeated: And the Lamb broke the sixth seal and lo, there was a great earthquake... The sun became black and the moon turned to blood...
denounced: Forgive them Father... they know not what they do...
introduction: And I saw, behold it was a white horse... and hell followed with him.
hateHello: God will not let you take me.
tradeRequest: Let us come to an agreement...

name: Robloxia
declaringWar: All your base are belong 2 me!

name: Westhelm
declaringWar: You may have stronger weapons and armor, but we have numbers!
attacked: You may have stronger weapons and armor, but we have numbers!
defeated: Now that all is said and done, the halls and courts that once held many now lay empty, drowning in a solemn silence of loss.
denounced: I will make sure everyone knows how corrupt you are!
uniques: [+25]% Production when constructing [Military] units [in all cities] <when at war>
